title: Forestal introduce the Cyon & Hydra eMTBs plus Aryon & Aryon SC urban eBikes
content:
Joining the Andorran brand’s debut bike, the Siryon eMTB, are four all-new Forestal eBikes completing a range that spans trail, enduro, downhill and urban categories. From the proprietary EonDrive motor, to the Alpha Box carbon frames, a folding chassis, fully integrated smart systems, Twin-Levity suspension and carbon belt drive, the vast array of technologies packed […]

The post Forestal introduce the Cyon & Hydra eMTBs plus Aryon & Aryon SC urban eBikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
